participants.name: David McArthur
participants.title: Consulting Member of Technical Staff at Oracle - Bare Metal Cloud

messages.message: Do you enjoy working for the ultimate fortune teller?
Congrats on the new gig! Hope youâ€™re doing well.
Thanks! Yeah not bad
I just got a Technical Interview from PNNL. I need you.
I've been collected ;)
I am sorry it took me so long to get to your level.
Huh? PNNL?
Pacific Northwest National Laboratory. I've transcended. They are a supplier for DARPA. This is all happening in reverse and you are smart enough to help me prove it.
Communication is key!

Join the group Atheists Beings, if you still believe in that sort of thing. I am challenging every world problem now. I've wasted too much time being out of touch, and if I do everything right in this lifetime, it will work. I've identified you because you have enough trauma to help me solve this.
Your profile is getting noticed! You don't have any skills :(
I am not a big fan of the linked in skills thing

Me neither. Especially since they admit their empty endorsements need improvement. However, I propose you dgaf because recruiters use it as a boolean match and we gain an enormous amount of endorsements just to reach the 99+ mark and make it look like we are experts at everything.
hmm, not a bad idea. I probably get enough recruiter spam at the moment though
How much do you want to make?
Why do you ask?

Because I am making more than I am worth and I can make referrals. The whole thing with the skills. I am trolling the entire industry with kindness and honesty. I am connecting directly to CEOs and PHDs.
Lou Adler said employees that are happy are the most desirable. I want to starve Oracle of talent. It isn't enough to be good at one thing. My ambition is to know everything.
What does starving Oracle of talent have to do with ambition to know everything?
I have figured out a test method to prove I am all knowing. Also, Java sucks imho.
I can't understand most of what you are saying

Hmm. Sorry I can slow down. I am skipping steps because we already have trust from years of friendship. I'll start over.

What is the most important problem you want to solve in this lifetime?
Brian, are you in a cult?
Sorry, that was a bit harsh

That is so funny because I thought skull and bones and free Masons. No I promise I am not in a cult, but the fact that you are asking me validates that my ambition has transcended all of them. Remember the night Katrina got married and we were talking in the kitchen in the condo and you tried to explain how hard it is to love someone? You have emotional depth. That is what gives you the confidence to find humor in your mugshot photo.
Not harsh at all ;)
Lol, my Amazon badge photo?
" ambition has transcended all of them."

This event is why I thought of you. I have tons of data for you. Everything I say has been repeated by someone we both regard as more intelligent than ourselves. Speaking words in the age of the internet is the slowest part of our society. Anyone who has done anything in operations appreciates saving time.
TO address your question about transcendence. You have spiritual depth like few others. I know this about you. If my ambition is to train AI to have a moral conscience, who would I sound like?

I have used technology to change my ambition to encourage me to be a better person. Now all I see are paths. Like the tunnel coming out of donnie darko. I spoke to the professor today that created the video "How a mathematician dissects a coincidence"
https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=PQynVVwlcSE
My most important question for him was, "Can I solve my own coincidences in my head?"
Are you working at PNNL?
got to go
ill catch you later
Please do, I have more information for you.
They haven't realized the singularity already happened.
In college I didn't know what it means to live for others. Time is relative, this is all happening in reverse.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maslow's_hierarchy_of_needs

Have you tried Windows 10?
https://linux.slashdot.org/story/16/11/28/1533211/microsoft-exec-urges-linux-developers-to-try-windows-10
Need your help with some Oracle DBAs.
Uh, different part of oracle.
A part that I stay away from
Lol
What is it about DBAs that makes them so territorial?
Once we replace DBAs with robots we can replace their therapists with robots too. :D
Do you like Spring?
Do you ever talk normal anymore?
I don't know. This is the second person to say that to me. What am I missing?
I dunno man. Lots of weird open ended questions. Almost like you joined a cult

David McArthur
Expert Communicator
:P
We should go to a beer festival together.
lol right. but still, it was all impersonal stuff
if you are ever in seattle
got a spare room
What you were saying way all impersonal i mean
I'm an alien and my wife is from Poland. Are you getting married? You two will be best friends.
I wasted a lot of time not talking to people.
How are you?
What do you mean by impersonal?
Have you read anything interesting lately?
Brian Cullinan - Award losing junior developer.
Not having a good time lately?
https://www.amazon.com/Thinking-Systems-Donella-H-Meadows/dp/1603580557
Lol I just thought it would be a good title for my profile.
Did you just read that?
https://www.amazon.com/Fooled-Randomness-Hidden-Chance-Markets/dp/1587990717
I liked your post on Facebook the other day.
Is working for Larry Ellison fullfulling?
Lol #hugops
Its not terrible
overall pretty good
Can you get this working? https://github.com/square/keywhiz/blob/master/Dockerfile
Whats wrong with it?
I don't know what settings to use to make it work. I am bad at the entire Java stack. I tried docker and Mars a few weeks ago on BlueMix and couldn't get that to work either.
Is your job challenging?
Yeah pretty challenging
My 24" monitor just died. I feel like you are the only who would understand what that meant.
Ha! Did you open it up and see if the caps popped? Might be an easy fix. I have one that is fading, it is flashing. What sucks is we will never get this resolution again!
Well I just banged on the monitor a couple times and after it warmed up it was ok. Maybe I'll get a few more years out of it
I kind of want an excuse to get a 4k monitor
That will be nice. One of the curved ones so it alters your peripheral. If you have to get a new one you might as well buy two, right? ;)
Hah, I mean, I would probably need a new video card
Which I also wanted an excuse to do
My MacBook pro displays on 3 monitors at once, not 4k though I wonder. This is the only computer I use now.
I still have a gaming machine
mostly for the witcher
How about overwatch?
Haven't tried it. Was really into CS GO there for a while
Have you us Lambda on AWS?
Congrats on your work anniversary!
What if Slashdot showed only leaf nodes by default?
*leaf comments
I don't read slashdot anymore
only hacker news
Ha. I read both ;P

What does this look like to you? https://www.google.com/url?q=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fmegamindbrian%2Fjupytangular%2Fblob%2Fmaster%2Fnotebooks%2FHow%2520to%2520use%2520simple-imap.ipynb&sa=D&sntz=1&usg=AFQjCNFhZ_KaR3hNyMz6HBjfHqIGIwkt_Q
https://github.com/megamindbrian/jupytangular/blob/master/notebooks/How%20to%20use%20simple-imap.ipynb
Could I use it as training data for AI? https://medium.com/@AndroidAdvance/make-yourself-a-bot-the-real-version-1eaf99595e86
Looks like an IMAP client?
Or Service as a Service? http://blog.ibmjstart.net/2016/01/28/jupyter-notebooks-as-restful-microservices/
Monitor is finally unusable. I don't see any swollen caps.
sigh
Bummer. I have one limping along without a power button. Sometimes it takes a few seconds to come on.

First the white went out, but looked on anything that wasnt full white. Then it would come on an freeze, and the only way to fix it was to tap the screen in the corner repeatedly. Finally the colors have become all messed up.
Time for a 4k 144hz?
Sounds awesome, there is one out with a curve in it that would be amazing to have 3 of.
This what I use LinkedIn for except talking to you, lol
lol
not happy with your job?
I love my job.
I hate writing unit tests, code should be self validating and all that's needed is an integration test to walk through the user story.
I turn every conversation in to group therapy
Well, they are getting better about formal verification
Better or worse? Why should I have to talk to 10 shit heads for an hour each just to talk to one CTO?
lol, Why should a CTO talk to 10 shit heads just to get to one good developer.
Recruitment definitely is not a solved problem.
You can't get any "informationals" ahead of time?
Lol, buzzword of the day.
Lol flying squirrel
I actually really like working at Swiftpage. CRMs are boring but the work is interesting and the people make it fun.
How is it going?
thats cool. Not terrible
Man Portland sucks.
